subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Catcher Jorge Posada, who retired following the 2011 season after 17 years as a Yankee, will be a guest instructor at spring training, while Yogi Berra stays home this year.
snippet: Catcher Jorge Posada, who retired following the 2011 season after 17 years as a Yankee, will be a guest instructor at spring training, while Yogi Berra stays home this year.
